ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: CANCAP-IV, Sta. 4.D11: Canary Islands, SW coast of La Palma, Puerto de Naos; 28°35'N 17°55'W; rocky andy sandy coast, depth to 15 m; scuba diving; 30,31.v.1980
CANCAP-III, Sta. 3.D05: SE coast of Madeira, Caniçal; 32°44'N 16°44'W; rocky (sub-)littoral with rockpools, depth to 20 m; scuba diving; 19,20.x.1978
CANCAP-II, Sta. 2.D07: Canary Islands, S coast of Hierro, W of Punta de los Saltos, Puerto de Naos; 27°39'N18°00'W; rocky bottom, depth 10-15 m; scuba diving 3,10.ix.1977
CANCAP-V, Sta. 5.139: Azores, W of Pico; 38°34'N 28°33'W; depth 77 m, sand and shell gravel; van Veen grab; 7.vi.1981
CANCAP-VII, Sta. 7.119: Cape Verde Islands, S of Razo; 16°36'N 24°36'W; depth 140-160 m, coarse calcareous sand, gravel and stones with Foraminifera; van Veen grab; 1.ix.1986
CANCAP-II, Sta. 2.129: Canary Islands, SW of Hierro, off Punta de Orchilla; 27°41'N 18°10'W; depth 900 m; van Veen grab; 6.ix.1977
PEL: Ghana., Formerly registered as Guinea. According to De Winter (pers. com. 2010) this should all be Ghana
